# EntityDefinition.NineSliceBorders property

An array of 4 dimensions for the up/right/down/left borders (in this order) when using 9-slice mode for `tileRenderMode`. If the tileRenderMode is not NineSlice, then this array is empty. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9-slice_scaling

```csharp
public int[] NineSliceBorders { get; set; }
```
